fields.name: Template_List_Upload
fields.fieldText:
Please provide the following info if it is not in the Lead/Account:

Create chats between restaurant:  

  • restaurant name - phone nr
  • and suppliers:
  • supplier name - phone nr - customer nr
    • chat: yes/no


CHATS INFO:

Restaurant name = 

Delivery address = 

Emails in copy =

Additional comments:
